name: 向昱竹
introduction: 2016年担任《引爆者》副导演。个人作品：《午夜阳台》(2020)获VIFF Vienna Independent Film Festival (2020) Best Director、Best Original Screenplay提名获Hollywood New Directors (2020) Honorable Mention《平凡生活》(2022)获Blow-Up Chicago International Arthouse Film Fest (2022) Semi-Finalist (Feature Film)获Maverick Movie Awards (2022) Best Director: Feature、Best Screenplay: Feature、Best Actor: Feature提名获London Arthouse Film Festival (2022) Best Feature Film提名获EdiPlay International Film Festival (2022) Best Narrative Feature (Monthly Competition) 提名并获奖获World Film Carnival, Singapore (2022) Golden Merlion Award (Amateur Film)、Monthly Award (Amateur Film)获Prague Youth Film Festival (2022) Best Feature Film提名
